Sentencas: An in-house micro model has been built to describe the electrochemical mechanisms governing both H-2 and O-2 electrodes operating in SOEC mode.
Titulo: Micro modelling of solid oxide electrolysis cell: From performance to durability

Sentencas: A special attention has been paid to take into account the microstructure properties of the ionic, electronic and gas phases as well as the processes occurring therein.
Titulo: Micro modelling of solid oxide electrolysis cell: From performance to durability

Sentencas: A commercial LSM-YSZ symmetrical cell has been tested at 700, 750 and 850 degrees C in air.
Titulo: Micro modelling of solid oxide electrolysis cell: From performance to durability

Sentencas: Simulations have been carried out to interpret the experimental data.
Titulo: Micro modelling of solid oxide electrolysis cell: From performance to durability

Sentencas: It is suggested that the kinetic of O-2 formation is controlled by a single charge transfer.
Titulo: Micro modelling of solid oxide electrolysis cell: From performance to durability

Sentencas: A sensitivity analysis has been performed using the micro model to quantify the role of the microstructure in the electrode behaviour.

Sentencas: Transport of oxygen ions in the functional layer has a strong impact on the cell response since it governs the delocalization of the electrochemical reactions.

Sentencas: The density of TPB length is also a key parameter controlling the electrode efficiency.

Sentencas: Evolutions of the microstructural parameters in operation have been associated to the degradation of the electrochemical performances.
